I wore the dress for a 1950s party and won the costume contest. If that doesn’t tell you about the dress, idk what will. If you want the full 1950s effect, make sure you buy a petticoat to wear underneath! Wearing one of those will actually make the dress sway like a swing dress if you know how to dance east/west coast swing!  Buttons on the dress are fake and for decoration. The material of the dress is thin and stretchy. It’s like spandex fabric. There are no pockets. It fits pretty snug on the body if you go with your normal size.

类型: Size: MediumColor: Red Small White Dot
评论详情: I ordered two sizes (M and L) of the same dress because my daughter's measurements were between the two sizes. She typically wears S, sometimes M. The dresses are nearly the same size, both a little too big. The M is 81% Rayon, 16% Nylon, 3% Elastane and feels like a thick picnic tablecloth or rain coat. The L is 95% Cotton and 5% Elastane as listed in the product details. It's much thinner and feels much more pleasant. If you need a costume either version is sufficient. If you want a real dress, it's quite disappointing to order cotton and get this.
